website_summaries.verdict: A two-in-one lamp that can be used as a desk lamp or extended to be a full-sized stand lamp. Excellent functionality with built-in touch control.
pros: The touch control is easy to operate, allowing you to set light brightness and color temperature, plus utilize the integrated timer
Solid and sturdy build with a heavy base to prevent toppling

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this lamp! The light settings alone are worth the cost, but the fact that you can adjust the height (by unscrewing 1-3 separate poles that attach to the base) makes it a great buy. It lights up a medium sized room in my house on the second lowest setting! I do a lot of needlework in the evenings and the different colors of light make a huge difference in seeing details. NOTE: the power cord plugs into the control panel, not the base. I have found that the 6 ft cord is a little short for my liking when the lamp is at the tallest height, but a plug strip solves that problem just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE AT FIRST LIGHT! Dynamite!
customer_reviews.text: Love at first light! Total excellence! Bright enough, dims very well, temperatures fit my artist’s needs. Full time artist need was for a lamp to position next to my artist’s table which adjusts in height and angle, and upon which no desktop lamp could be attached. I worried lamp would not be bright enough, but this photo is with light at dimmest setting. Quality and weight heavy enough to insure stability. Is shipped in a quality box with fitted foam protector and was pristine and assembled in less than 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than pictured
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is worth the price. Assembled to its tallest length, it sits a little bit above the height of my desk. READ MEASUREMENTS, because pictures make it look larger than it actually is. It is NOT as tall as your typical floor lamp. Also the base is so thin it toppled over before I’d had it set up for even 5 minutes. The cord is also so short and connects over halfway UP the pole, instead of being at the base.. you have to put it directly beside an outlet for it to reach. I’m definitely returning!
customer_reviews.author: ShawnaLiz89

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that there is a light on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this lamp beside my bed. It's a little shorter than I was expecting but has adequate height. What I'm not crazy about is the small blue LED on the power button. I like the fact that there is a light on the power button to help me locate it in the dark but it would have been better if it were red. Blue may seem cool/modern to manufacturers but, in a room where darkness is desirable, red is better. Blue just lights up the room more than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Best lamp for office and reading
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use as a desk lamp and set it up with two of the extender poles plus the lamp pole. I waved the 3rd extender pole for future use when I purchase another one of these lamps to use close to the chair my wife reads in all of the time I will be able to increase the height for better light by her chair. The adjustability of the lamp is fantastic and the ability to change the color from bright white to softer yellow is amazing. The lamp has also helped me see small print easier. Old eyes need more light and this lamp delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reading light, sturdy and transforms to a desk lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Our 13 year assembled this lamp in under 10 minutes. Sturdy and bright! Can fold down and become a desk lamp. Provides excellent lighting! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Martins

customer_reviews.title: Great for Reading
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good lamp for reading in bed, and this works perfectly. I love being able to adjust the color, intensity, and angle. I did have to put a piece of electrical tape over the power button because the blue light keeps me awake at night (the only detractors from five stars), but that was an easy fix and does not impede use. Control pad is in a perfect spot for access while in bed, and I don't think they are too noticeable to be an eye sore; although the lamp is certainly not decorative it's streamlined and not ostentatious. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: it is very portable and useful but after a couple months it started to droop
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months, it is very portable and useful but after a couple months it started to droop. It would not stay up as the flexible bendy neck part would not hold the lamp up. It now sits very unattractively and isn't very useful unless you are in a specific low position - like lying down. I will probably replace it with something else
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light, But Nowhere Near 1815 Lumens
customer_reviews.text: This light is simple and elegant, but it provides only about 900 or 950 lumens. It is nowhere near the rated 1815 lumens. Using only 12 watts, there is no way they could get 1815 lumens out of it. We measured about half of that. It also seems to be just over twice as bright as a 400-lumen TaoTronics desk lamp, which agrees with our measurement. The external cord with velcro ties is not elegant, but it is fine for most locations. I might not want it dangling down if I used this light in the middle of my living room, however. Seems reasonably sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Quality and unobstrusive
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable reading lamp is exactly what we've needed. It's quality-made, easy to set up, and like the different lighting modes available as well as the ability to reconfigure it to function as a desk lamp as needed. We wanted two of these for the living room and searched for something that wasn't huge and would dominate the room. This doesn't at all. It is not inexpensive, but feel that quality and likely durability are worth it. Would recommend this to friends to purchase and we would purchase again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Graphique

customer_reviews.title: Bright and have indicators to show brightness level
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much. It is verbal sturdy. 5 brightness level, 5 color mode from most blue/white to most yellowish. Two features that I like is 1. It has brightness level indicator. 5 blue led lights, each is 20%. My older led lamp does not have this, so I always has to press many times to make sure i am at maximum brightness level. 2. When turn it off, it has 2 sec delay to give you time to leave the room
customer_reviews.author: L. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Very bright or dim whatever you choose
customer_reviews.text: Second TaoTronics lamp. Our first was a nice desk lamp. This one was for our 9 year old because he kept knocking off the lamp in the badside table. This lamp has a fairly heave and slim profile base plate. The option to make into a desk lamp is nice. The brightness settings are great for low light reading and brighter needs like sewing or hobby crafts. The controls on the neck are nice and easily accessible from bed. My son loves it so far Not sure why everyone's photos have the power cord coming from the controller. Mine connects to an extension inside the 3 piece stem and the power cord plugs in at the base near the floor.
customer_reviews.author: ElecEnthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Good at first....
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this lamp when I first got it.. It was sturdy, Very bright exactly what I wanted. I used it a lot. But after a while it became the most annoying lamp.. the sturdiness of the lamp was gone. Started falling apart. And the bendable part of the lamp is totally useless now. It does not hold shape or support the lamp itself. I can adjust it 10 times and it just bends down and does whatever it wants. Very frustrating and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Shak

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I WANTED AND NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with this lamp and especially for the price. I just received it yesterday and it was so easy to put together (I am an 83 year old lady) and it is just what I wanted. The 4 stars is only because the cord has to lay outside of the pole but that is because it can be converted into a table lamp as well and with the cord being this way, it makes the transition so much better. So many choices as to brightness of light, intensity of light and the touch panel is very sensitive. Did a lot of research with all the other light offers and think I chose the best.
customer_reviews.author: wanabe100

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is easy to adjust and I like that it offers varying brightnesses in warm and cool shades. What I am disappointed in, however, is the actual brightness. I had hoped that it would be several times brighter than what it is. If I’d have had a chance to try it prior to purchasing, I would not have bought it. I didn’t want to bother sending it back. It adds minimal actual light to my sewing area.
customer_reviews.author: G. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Flexible lighting for a variety of uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp because I already have a Taotronics desk lamp that is the best I've ever owned. I like the flexibility of easily changing brightness and color temperature. The controls are VERY responsive - for brightness and color, I think you only have to get your finger very close to the button, not actually on it to activate it. The on-off button has a subtle light on it so you can find it in the dark. It's very stable with the weighted base. I can't vouch for its longevity as I just got it, but the desk lamp is going just fine after almost 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: DrBob

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable light with four different brightness levels as well ...
customer_reviews.text: Great adjustable light with four different brightness levels as well as color changing bulb (bright white, off white, etc.) The only possible drawback is that the power cord runs down the side of the pole. While there are two Velcro ties to hold the cord in place, the wire isn't really tight all the way down. As such, someone could catch on it walking by and pull the lamp down. However, I like the brightness of it as a reading lamp! The bulb is supposed to last for an amazingly long time so bulb replacement isn't an issue at present. I like it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: With age comes wisdom... but also come poor eyesight. LOL We needed a light that we could aim toward our projects and the regular living room lights weren't cutting it. This works great because the gooseneck allows us to move it exactly in the position we need for whatever we're doing. We removed one of the extension rods, and so it can swing right over our shoulder in our lounge chairs in the living room. I love the adjustable color temp and intensity. This was definitely something I had to have, and it makes a HUGE difference depending on the time of day that you use the light. It's great and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: AM4Z0N_SH0PP3R

customer_reviews.title: Almost Bought A Highly Rated LED Lamp for $299 Then Found This
customer_reviews.text: I have needed a floor lamp for some time. I recently saw an ad in the WSJ for a three-bulb LED floor lamp for $299. It promised a lot of light. I then decided to look on line to see what other choices I should consider and found this light. I love it and it cost only a fraction of what I first looked at. Plenty bright light. Controllable with a dimmer and as a plus, one can get different shades from really bright white light to a softer warm light. This should satisfy even the most discriminating buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Loarie

customer_reviews.title: Good for reading and working
customer_reviews.text: Appearance: the base is thin but It’s heavy, so the whole lamp looks slim and minimalistic but it’s very stable. Controls: there are no traditional buttons, just a touch panel with a power icon with always-on signal light, a icon for five different colors model and a icon for five different levels of brightness. Function: this lamp is really good for reading or working, either by a sofa as I show in the picture or by a desk. It’s about 55 inches in height so it can serve as a desk lamp by placing it by the desk. Be aware, it’s not a lamp for general lighting to light up a whole room. It’s only for area lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Hymer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, quite fast as a matter of fact and the brightness is very, very good for us with old eyes. I read a lot and this is perfect next to my chair. Multiple levels of light, LED is great, very adjustable head and neck. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading and lighting up a dark area in a room
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a dark corner of my bedroom near my bed. This light is amazing for that job. It has a gooseneck, which allows me to face it up to light the room generally or face it down to make it a reading light. I ended up taking the base off of it and attaching it to my bed frame, this put the light in a perfect position. I love that it can change the color temperature and adjust the brightness, so I can make it easy on the eyes in the evening time. It was the perfect addition to my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Not that fancy, but extremely versatile
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my favorite fancy floor lamp shorted out. It’s nowhere as stylish as the old one, nor flattering looking, but it’s very functional, more so than my old lamp (sorry brightech). Easy to put together, five different warmth and brightness settings, easy to adjust the direction, etc. In short, it does everything you need a floor lamp to do, for a very reasonable price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Solanacea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Lamp performs exactly as advertised. 5 brightness levels. 5 color temperature levels. Yielding 25 combinations. Has 1 hour timed delay option for automatic turn off. Upon placing lamp in standby off mode, lamp turns back on with the settings it had when it was previously on. Sturdy. Has 3 poles. Don't have to use all pole sections which allows different heights. Excellent lamp. Excellent performance. Impressed with compact, good packing in box. Very easy and quick to assemble. Couldn't be more pleased. I am so thankful I ended up selecting this lamp. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it it is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it it is perfect. I bought this to use when doing jigsaw puzzle’s. The ability to change the tone and brightness of the lighting is great, as it helps reveal subtle shading differences in pieces that are basically the same color. This would also make a fantastic reading lamp. The brightest settings are quite bright. The lamp is easy to move, but the base is Unobtrusive and could easily be slipped under furniture even with a very low clearance. The base is heavy but not too heavy to move that gives good stability.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah WinslowTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Love these lamps
customer_reviews.text: I have one on my desk. It is nice and streamline and doesn't take up much space. Doesn't get hot. Touch buttons. After looking at the same brand I purchased a floor lamp. It came packaged carefully. Very easy to assemble and the lighting is perfect. I prefer the bright white to the yellow. I would like to mention that this lamp is about 12 inches higher than my glider. I like the fact that the controls are on the neck of the lamp rather than on top of the lamp itself. Going to set up a crafts table soon and will be purchasing another lamp. I defiantly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice and bright to read by or do small crafts
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was a little less than expected as far as the weight. It "was quite top-heavy therefore easy to tip over on carpeting if it doesn’t have a heavy. base underneath it. The very first time I used it, I accidentally pushed the lamp on an off button too hard and it caused the lamp to fall on my carpeting. The same thing happened several times that evening barely touching the lamp and each time the same results. I stopped using It on carpeting and moved it to hardwood floor where it’s just fine.. I will have to find something different for carpeted areas . I should’ve paid a little more for a better lamp
customer_reviews.author: Mary Harper

customer_reviews.title: 12W Switch operation is great. The stand breaks down to three sections and ...
customer_reviews.text: Had [[ASIN:B0719QYRYD Floor Lamps, VAVA Dimmable LED Reading Lamp for Living Room, 1815 Lumens & 50,000 Hours Lifespan, Standing Lamp Desk Lamp Two in One, Flexible Gooseneck, Touch Control Panel, UL adapter, 12W Switch operation is great. The stand breaks down to three sections and base. One of the section was not included. I can use it as a desk lamp but not as a floor lamp, which the reason that i purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M. Salinas, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I have a chair and ottoman in my bedroom that I am using more frequently and at night, it’s not bright enough to read. The touch controls are easy to use. I can adjust it to be brighter or less bright and there are settings for warm, bright, etc. It’s perfect and at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Fisher

customer_reviews.title: VERSATILE, CONVERTIBLE HEIGHT BRIGHT OR DIM LAMP
customer_reviews.text: What a clever invention! I hope this product becomes ubiquitous because it can do so much and is easy to turn on and off with a light touch. My husband wanted a brighter reading lamp, so voila! I think I put it together in about 5 minutes. If someday, he prefers it to be shorter, that can be arranged, as it converts to a desk or table lamp by removing sections of the pole. Also, it looks nice in the living room, not too techy. Oh, yes, and the color tone can be changed (like warm or cool light.) It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: TallPat

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to set the color of the light, warm or cool, and intensity. The control is a touch screen. The neck is easy to position. The base is just heavy enough but not any more. I can use it for any task and my favorite desk lamp. I've never seen such perfect design. And it came in a small box, with segments that screw together. Easy to assemble, and super packaging. Never thought I would love a lamp, but this one has it all. The design and execution are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: wannabe engineer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for desk lamp. Would work well for a Recliner reading lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed lamp. When I first opened it I was a little worried when I saw the light fixture. It didn't look like it would provide proper lighting. I put it together and am glad I was wrong. This puts out plenty of light. I like the fact that it is adjustable also. The way the sections work is great. This lamp has four possible heights. I am using only one extension on my desk. It comes with three. I am using one so it can reach of the top of my computer monitor. The base is heavy so the lamp stays put. Over all I am very pleased with this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: RonM3rd

customer_reviews.title: Bright blue light makes reading easier for me.
customer_reviews.text: My retina opthamologist recommended that I see a vision therapist. The vision therapist ophthalmologist & 2 technicians recommended this particular light. I am completely satisfied w/ this light! The combination of brightness & the blue light make reading far easier for me than conventional white light. Evidently the blue wavelength is far more helpful than white/yellow light & contrast on newspaper & books is far better w/ the blue end of the spectrum. Good light. Good price. Fast shipping. = completely satisfied.Jeff Brami
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second item we own from this brand and I have to say it’s VERY impressive. The metal is top quality, very sturdy. The switch is touch enabled, light goes stronger or dimmer using touch buttons. Good looking lamp that doesn’t compromise on quality. My only minor comment is that the instructions could be ever so slightly clearer and dumb proofed. But it takes only a bit of common sense to figure out that the wire goes inside the pipe! :)
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Nice reading light.
customer_reviews.text: It is very sleek and easy to set up, it has 4 settings for brightness and its goose neck helps to re focus light based on our needs. I use it mainly as a reading light and it does the job pretty well but it can be also used for other purposes like a floor lamp in a small room but it may not be able to provide enough brightness for a large room. One more nice thing is that in the dark the switch button is lit for us to know exactly where the switch is in the dark to on the light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a mini streetlight
customer_reviews.text: the lamp is very easy to assemble, you just need to screw several tubes together and connect the power cord. it is like a mini streetlight with adjustable height, very bright at the full power mode. the different color temperatures feature is great, I like the yellowish one best. the touch panel is very sensitive, you just need a very gentle touch to change the brightness or color temperatures. the base is heavy, which makes the lamp very stable. I myself like the lamp a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, detail intended design.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this floor lamp for more than two weeks and so far so good.The set is easy to set up which took me less than ten minutes to assemble the whole thing, didn’t have to read the instructions, pretty straight forward. The control panel is located in the middle section of the lamp, Including power button, adjustment to the brightness, switch from LED to natural light mode. I feel like it’s more appropriate to be my bed side lamp so I could use it during my reading time. Now I am enjoying my reading with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chenxian Mao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light for readers or people w/ headaches
customer_reviews.text: Finally!! I'm so excited that I found a floor lamp that is perfect for me! After undergoing chemo, I was left with permanent headaches and migraines. I'm able to change the color and brightness of the light! Plus, with one simple touch, I am able to turn it on or off. The power button, glows blue. Off Timer: Simply, hold down a particular button for a few seconds and the lamp automatically turns off after 1 hour, if I'm not mistaken. I'm asleep when it turns off.
customer_reviews.author: DIS1972

customer_reviews.title: Good quality light at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it as a reading lamp, next to an easy chair. Very happy with the purchase. base is heavy enough to keep it from wandering around or falling over when the cats run into it. I like the various light qualities which I can change as the room lighting and my work items change. It is a bit ODD how the power attaches to the middle of the lamp, but I dressed it with a few small, black zip ties and it's hard to notice. Good purchase overall and I'd recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: JoeG

customer_reviews.title: not as described
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is sleek and I like the design, but it’s not as described. Look closely at the video description and you will see the wiring is outside the lamp. The lamp I received was different and could not be converted to a desktop lamp as stated in the description. Very disappointed especially after seeing all the positive reviews
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light, juts a little short
customer_reviews.text: The lamp came in a sturdy packed box. Easy to assemble. Love all the light colors and brightness levels!! Con: I wish it had one more section on the vertical post to get the lamp head higher. The measurement for height is if you had the extended as a straight pole. Once you lean it over 80 degrees it shortens it. Still a great light for reading.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Great for Crafting and General Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I wanted something taller. However I traded that for the different shades of light and levels of brightness you can adjust. The base is small but heavy. I use it for general lighting and crafts. It doesn't throw off heat like a traditional lamp which keeps my apartment cool. The different shades of colors helps with my eyes.. they don't fatigue and it's easier to see the colors I am working with when crafting. I do wish there was a taller model.
customer_reviews.author: OpieSquish

customer_reviews.title: The light is bright enough on high setting and I like the ability to change to different types of lighting
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is exactly what I needed by my recliner. At first I had difficulty screwing the sections together and thought I had gotten some rods with crossed threads. But you just have to play with it and they will screw together. The light is bright enough on high setting and I like the ability to change to different types of lighting. I have actually moved the light to different rooms for some different projects, and I need to order another one. The base is heavy enough to keep the lamp stable
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable height
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to assemble without reading the instruction. Good floor lamp that can adjust the height and even place it in the table. The only minor complain is this is not a smart device so no voice control or color changes.
customer_reviews.author: Ice monster

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is actually better than I'd expected. The brightness and tone settings work well and easily, and the lamp is stable on our tile floor. (My old library lamp rocked unless it was squarely on the tiles.) Obviously, I'm using this as a floor lamp, and it sits at a height that is perfect for me. I do not feel any heat from the lamp, even when I sit reading for a few hours. I'd definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible task light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp for painting, sewing, or any such craft or task. I love that the temperature and brightness is adjustable, and that it remembers my last setting! It is easy to move around and place in the perfect spot. I did get two for painting so my canvas was evenly lit on both sides. It’s well made and packaged but lightweight for carrying. Glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: VAVA dimmable LED lamp
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was hoping the lamp was as good as the reviews. All I can say is WOW! My house is dark and I needed a good lamp, this exceeded my expectations! It was easy to put together, the base heavy enough that it does not knock over easily and the dimmer is fabulous for adjusting the amount of light. I could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Golding

customer_reviews.title: Smart Design and Construction
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp for many reasons: height adjustable - light adjustable for hue and brightness level - easy to assemble - low profile - adjustable angle of light. I was looking for a floor lamp that was shorter than the usual height, and this one fit the bill, as it comes in three parts, so just left off the middle tube, and it's the perfect height for me. I couldn't be happier with this purchase!There are many LED floor lamps on the market, but I am completely satisfied with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to assemble, good light...but started getting a headache within minutes of using.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was received in a timely manner and was easy to assemble. It was well-made and the buttons\switches worked well. It put off a fair amount of light and definitely helped light up my basement office. However, after a few minutes I found it difficult to look screen to screen or adjust from screen to keyboard. I also started getting a headache shortly after use. Might just be a defective unit but using this light for my intended purpose doesn't seem to be working out.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R Montmarquet

customer_reviews.title: Great for my craft room!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these lamps and couldn't be happier with them. I use them on my craft table to not only light my work while I'm crafting, but also for lighting my YouTube videos. They were super easy to assemble, are lightweight, but with a sturdy base so they don't topple over. The light settings from cool to warm and levels of brightness are a very nice feature. I'm super happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Green

customer_reviews.title: Good lighting option
customer_reviews.text: "This light is easy to fix and comes in detachable pole. All you do is screw the post into each other they are in the correct order as they have a wire running through, so no need to guess which pole goes where. The poles screw in excellently in to position. You just attach the adaptor the light has easy to touch button at the top of the light it sits nice in the corner. The top bit of the light is flexible so you can move it into position as to how your sitting. The light options are good as you can change them to how dim or bright you need them. A lovely and easy to store light."
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Sepe

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect product for a small space where good lighting is essential. It is easily adaptable as a floor lamp (that's what I'm using it for) or a desk lamp. The adjustable brightness works very well - the highest selection for reading/paperwork or the lowest for background light. I also bought one for my mother who has macular degeneration and she LOVES it. My daughter purchased one for her desk in her home office. We are all extremely pleased with the product. And it's so easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia G-ma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality; fair price; very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent & good looking. Quicker to assemble than to take out of the box! Electronics are in the top section; no wires to run through the tubes. The transformer is in the plug module so there are no high voltage dangers. Very simple to use. Mult. brightness & color settings. Light is even, well diffused, & very bright at high setting. Minor negative: It's rather tipable (I fixed this with a 10# barbell wt. put on the base, over the bottom pole).
customer_reviews.author: SHO50

customer_reviews.title: Lamp provides excellent array of choices for lighting needs whether low or bright
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lamp. I have it placed near my bed, so it is easy to turn on and off at a mere touch. The vast array of brightness level choices, and warm or cool tone options, are a plus, as there are times minimal light is desired, while other times I prefer a stronger light source. The ability to move the flexible lamp head to most any position is convenient, allowing light to project downward or to an upward position. The base is sturdy and heavy enough to not tip over. The lamp is not at all obtrusive, and takes up little space, all the while providing EXCELLENT light to my room.
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr303

customer_reviews.title: bright
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad's study. It provides a lot of light for reading and crafting. Super bright, easy to assemble, and use. Lots of dim settings and the ability to change the color is awesome
customer_reviews.author: colmen

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I dont have any other lamps that are similar, but this one seems pretty good. I like that the buttons for this were on the main body of the lamp pole rather than on the flexible neck. The buttons are also touch sensitive and do not require force to activate. Its got some good weight to it so its pretty sturdy, combined with the easy buttons it doesnt move by accident. When placed on the floor the buttons are about 1 foot below standard light switch height which is great for next to a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Aguy

customer_reviews.title: Sunvalley's customer service shines as brightly as this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I've regularly relied on this floor lamp since I purchased it in May 2018. The different gradations of light are fine, and the lamp is easy to operate. After I recently accidentally cut the AC cord, Sunvalley Brands immediately responded to my request for an AC power adopter/cord replacement. Via emails, Sunvalley's customer service representative, Chloe, was professional and courteous, and the company quickly followed through with its replacement to make my lamp operable. I am as impressed with Sunvalley's customer service as I am with the lamp. Thanks, Sunvalley.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Porter

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable brightness and temperature.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is perfect for my living room . It has an adjustable/flexible silicone gooseneck so you can set it at the angle you want. I like that you can change the temperature. It has 5 different cold to warm temperatures and 5 brightness levels. It's really bright and can light up the whole room! Since it's an LED light it has the long lifespan (up to 50,000 hours) and the low energy consumption too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love; great light and literally a snap to put together.  Took seconds to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery and a snap to put together. Literally took me seconds to put together. I'm a little lady and it took me seconds. The light is perfect. My office is dark and this like raidates with great light and no heat. Love it. Can't say enough great things about it. I bought another light tha looked similar with similar pricing to light up the room. This one arrived days ago; the other is still isn't in. Because of this, this one is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Happy Gal

customer_reviews.title: Love the lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love the lamp! Perfect size for next to my couch. Really like switching between the daylight and more yellow tone modes. People complain about the cord. I would rather have it come out there than have it go all the way to base. I can't tell you how many lamps I've had that have developed issues with the base because of this. This base is flat and very stable and that won't change over time. I hope to use this for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: This is one GREAT lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice lamp! Well designed and well put together. Transforming from desk lamp to floor lamp takes less than 1 minute. Nice firm gooseneck holds its position perfectly - no slipping and drooping. Nice BRIGHT white light - I wouldn't need or want it any brighter. Controls include soft touch ON-OFF, rheostat to make light brighter or dimmer, and a 1 hour timer. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bumpkinboy

customer_reviews.title: A perfect transitioning light for all your favorite reading materials
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this light at my sisters house I absolutely loved it! It is a perfect transitioning light for all your favorite reading materials it it has four different light color settings from cool to warm and also on each of those, three different intensities settings. it is great for the desktop and easily transforms to a floor lamp for all your favorite work space or reading places!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Carter

customer_reviews.title: Best floor lamp I have ever had!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed by this lamp. It is a LED light, which has a very long lifetime. So I don't need to worry about changing the light. It doesn't generate much heat at summer. The base is very stable, which is safe for little one at home. The coolest thing is it can change the brightness and color temperatures. It can satisfy different needs for all family members. I also like the touch control design. Overall, I like it soooo much. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Yao

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tool for generating and directing light
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lamp that that I could use for reading in a specific arm chair, and this lamp is ideal. This is a great tool for generating and directing light, especially for reading. It's well made, with a sturdy base, does what it's supposed to, and gives you the ability to adjust the intensity and color temperature of the light. It doesn't get hot. But it's less successful as a decorative accessory. A lot of people want lamps that are attractive or that fit into a room's decor. If you feel that way, this might not be the best lamp for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: I can see clearly now
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely amazed. Overnight deliverly...I was not expecting that at all! It was a cinch. The packaging...is easily transformed...my granddaughter loves her new "suitcase" for her dolls, books, and crayons as the box is quite sturdy. The lamp exceeds my expectations; sturdy (no tipping over), nice looking, and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light to use with an acrylic paint-by-number set which had tons of tiny spots to paint. It did the trick! Love that I could turn it a more yellow hue when painting after dark and a nice bright bluer tone for during the day. I wish it were adjustable up and down. It’s a bit top-heavy, as well. Overall, I really like the lamp!
customer_reviews.author: E. Bartos

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a floor lamp that can brighten my desk when working on my computer. Most are not tall enough and others are small desktop lamps that do not work well without getting in the line of sight for the computer screens. This floor lamp can be converted into a desktop lamp which turned out to be the best way to go for me. Since there are four sections that screw together, I was able to use just 3 of them to make the lamp shine from above the monitors off of the desktop. It sits behind the monitor and shines down onto the desk. I ordered a second one to light up more of my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my life easier!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp just made my life easier. I wish I bought this sooner because I sell online and I usually work at night to ship some orders for the next day. I need a bright lamp to make sure all products that I ship are right and in good condition. I like that it's so easy to set up, it took me just 10 minutes and it works really well. The different settings is what makes this lamp amazing. I can also use it to take pictures of my products as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Almira

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing lamps I've owned. They make it so much easier to read by and my husband has one in his studio to paint by. I just ordered my sister 2 of them and she loves them and 2 of my cousins have one a piece and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: zebsmom

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: This light is attractive, was extremely easy to assemble and is everything it promised to be.It has several light settings which have come in handier than I thought. It is attractive and sturdy with a heavy base which gives the light great stability. I am very happy with this light and would recommend it to others needing good illumination for whatever their needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I spent considerable time and effort evaluating the floor lamp that would best serve my needs. I finally settled on this lamp, and it arrived promptly from amazon. The lamp is well constructed, and the parts fit together to form a solid, attractive light. I am using the light to illuminate my keyboard, and it looks great, and performs flawlessly. It provides excellent light output, and it can be dimmed at the press of a button. The light can be changed from cold white to warm softer hues, and varied to any color between the extremes. I am completely satisfied with my purchase, would purchase it again, and would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Warren

customer_reviews.title: ... lamp a week or two and so far I love it. I am a crocheter and need ample ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this lamp a week or two and so far I love it. I am a crocheter and need ample light which this lamp produces. One of the best features of this lamp for me is it doesn't give off heat like most lamps which I find most uncomfortable. The range of light control and variation is more than I'll probably ever use but there is sure to be something to suit everyone. The cord on the side seems to bug some people but not me. I would recommend this lamp and would buy a second one if I ever have the need. The product came very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a few days, but I think I can safely see that this is a great lamp. First of all, it is well made mechanically, with the various parts fitting together easily and tightly. The base is solid and heavy, and it doesn't rock. The LED lighting is amazing, and I have found that it is great for reading, which is why I bought this. I also have a Taotronics desk lamp, which has worked perfectly since I bought it two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier Guy

customer_reviews.title: Much-Needed Light for Elderly Mom
customer_reviews.text: My mom is 103, and has age-related macular degeneration and glaucoma. With this light and her reading glasses, she still can read the newspaper! The only drawback are the controls. Mom just presses the entire panel willy-nilly until the light come on. As a result, she inadvertently presses the dimmer, so it's often not as bright as it needs to be for her to read. The buttons on the panel should be raised and be very distinct, in color and in shape and size.
customer_reviews.author: Anniebananie

customer_reviews.title: Make my work in front of computer easier.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a very old and light bulk style lamp. No doubt this lamp is very modern style, i can move it around any angle and height, which is very convenient when I use my computer and write something. You can adjust 5 different brightness, starting from the 3rd-4th level, the whole room can be lit up.
customer_reviews.author: Twisna

customer_reviews.title: Easy Touch Control.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned other TaoTronic products, but I think this lamp outperforms the others! The touch control is so easy to use and the lighting is very bright. I use this lamp for hand sewing so the white light is very important. The soft light works for reading at night before I go to sleep. It's very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Dad's reading light
customer_reviews.text: Well made, attractive. Well packaged and quick intuitive assemble. Usually, I prefer warm light usually at level 1 or 2. The illuminated blue dot on/off switch makes it easy to find in dark. I might add more ballast to floor plate as if I bump light, the lamp has tipped over occasionally...my fault for being clumsy. Bought two.
customer_reviews.author: faraway

customer_reviews.title: Love the Auto Shut-Off feature!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light. The adjustable brightness and "light's " color is nice but since it is used for bedtime reading the one hour auto shut-off feature is fantastic. Falling asleep reading then having the light shut itself off is our favorite feature! The base is heavy enough to eliminate the "tippy" issues that some floor lights have and the quality seems good. The $69 price is very fair since we had purchased some others that ended up failing in some fashion and were thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Great Night Reading Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have to say it was super easy to install, it look me only 3 minutes! It’s stylish and good quality. It allows different light mode and brightness adjustment. Perfect replacement for my desktop lamp on the night stand, now I have more room on my night stand for my books. I can adjust the brightness as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Miss P.

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: it is a great lamp! I can just the light to different occasions. Also I can based on the time to adjust the light level. I bought another lamps since I just moved recently. The best part of this one is the line is in the bottom of the lamb and I don’t need to try to stick the line.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great desk light with all the right adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Really like this light, perfect for the desk. 5 levels of brightness, 5 temperatures. Just hit the temp button till it best complemented the desk. Just the right height to clear the monitors and light work area. Slim with heavy base, decorative yet sturdy. Buttons operate with the lightest touch. Purchasing a second light, this one is right on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect at the Piano!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this lamp. It is so easy to put together and feels super sturdy when assembled. The touch buttons to turn it on are super intuitive and it puts off a good amount of light. It is perfect at the piano where it replaced a clip on light that had a more limited area of coverage. Its not the most beautiful lamp but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: MeMenlo

customer_reviews.title: Bright, dimable , reliable
customer_reviews.text: Replaced two old floor lamps with this item. Perfect for reading or task lighting. You can adjust the color and the intensity with the touch panel. Mine did not come with a remote control which really isn't needed anyway. A great product which I would buy again if I could think of someone to give it to. Yea I like it that much.
customer_reviews.author: JFW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and plenty bright
customer_reviews.text: I like my new lamp. It's stylish, I love the two different color balances. Warm or white. I prefer warm. The functions all work easily so there is no need to read the instruction manual. The only thing I wish was different was the lamps ability to dim more. Even on it's lowest setting it's pretty bright. Wish I could dim it down and use it to barely illuminate an area. Yes, 1st world problem.
customer_reviews.author: Raygunnn

customer_reviews.title: A great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by the quality and functionality of the lamp. Assembly was super simple - took less than 2 minutes. I really like both the dimming feature and the ability to change the color modes. I have the lamp next to my bed to use as a reading light. Might purchase another for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Louis C.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp with multiple lighting options
customer_reviews.text: Love the light, a wide range of brightness and can switch between daylight or soft white. Easy controls and took about a minute to put the thing together and couldn't be happier with the product.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light for the living room. It is super bright at the highest setting and nice and low for night to not mess with your Circadian cycle. You can move the neck around to almost any position and it will hold nice and tight. It also has white balance/temp control so you can adjust for the time of day or night.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Bloom

customer_reviews.title: The VAVA Dimmable LED Reading Lamp for Living Room, is great
customer_reviews.text: The LED Dimmable light is a fantastic light. It is a touch control which means you don't have to turn a knob or even push a button, you merely touch it and the light comes on. Also raising the brightness is just as easy. The assembly took a few minutes and it was easy. It can be used on a desk or as a floor lamp too, it's very versatile. I especially like the fact I can get the right amount of light for the time of day I'm using it. It's a good buy, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Conferw

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be assembled as desk lampbas shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent lamp for floor standing use. But the pictures are misleading about the desktop use. You cannot assemble it as short as shown in the picture for desktop use. At the minimum you have to use one extension rod and that makes it too tall for desktop use.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Versatile, lightweight, multi-functional, and easy to assemble. I absolutely love the five brightness and color temperature levels. I suffer from light sensitivity, so, these features are extremely important to me. It can function as a desk lamp or a nice height floor lamp. The lamp stands high enough behind my sofa so that touchpad controls are easily accessible. I bought the VAVA floor lamp to study by. What a great find and investment. The daylight brightness is my favorite setting. From my perspective, you won't go wrong with this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Meier

customer_reviews.title: great lamp!!!
customer_reviews.text: i have no light bulbs in my living room in my apartment and have been relying on light strips. I feel like i have finally decided to get a lamp for next to the couch, and i love the different brightness settings as well as light settings. I don't like white light personally but i love that it gives the option in case i have a friend over or something who likes white light. Very customizable and easy to assemble. love it
customer_reviews.author: Kareem Gayar

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable height, and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I can happily say that you get what you paid for with this one. the 5 light power and warmth options all work great, and the buttons are very responsive (sensitive, even) to the touch. My one complaint is that it's kinda hard to stuff the power cable slack into the remaining tubes when you adjust the size.
customer_reviews.author: some guy on amazon

customer_reviews.title: Well built, sturdy lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought TaoTronics table lamp with the phone charger and loved it so much I purchased this floor lamp and love also. These lamps are sturdy, well built and have great clear light. I can’t say enough about this company and their products. I am very happy I took a chance on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cord is exposed
customer_reviews.text: Other than the cord being exposed instead of coming out the bottom of the lamp near the floor this is a great light. Very well packaged and easy to set up. The base could be more stable but should work OK as long as you don't have any radical pets or kids because it could be knocked over real easy. The light hues are very nice and it is very bright. Had the cord came out the bottom like it should have, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: Started flickering after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted. Bought two of these lamps 3 years ago. Nice to have adjustable brightness. I wish it had an even warmer color setting available. We usually use the warmest color setting, but after two years, both have a constant flicker when using that color setting. Disappointed with the flickering. Also, the touch panel is sometimes annoying to use because it's so easy to accidentally touch the wrong button. The button to change the color is placed very close to the power button, and there have been many occasions when I accidentally changed the color when I meant to reach for the power button.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: This functions very well as lamp. Brightness levels are good, and it gets bright at maximum. Neck flexibility is good.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.T.

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing two desk lamps from this company and needing a floor lamp for reading, this was my choice. It is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good style and easy setup floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this floor lamp for my living room, when I watch TV, I like to turn it on, you can always change the brightness and the color as well. Simple easy to install and very good style, I would recommend it for people who just looking for a good and easy setup floor lamp.
customer_reviews.author: karlpan

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp with lots of settings
customer_reviews.text: We loved this lamp so much we bought a second one! We love that it has so many settings to choose from. Its nice to be able to have a dim light so as not to disturb your significant other. The bright setting makes everything clear and crisp. I do a lot of needlepoint and this lamp makes a world of difference for my bad eyes. I also like the base. Its very sturdy but yet easy to move around. I kinda wish I could change the bulb at some point but maybe this lamp will outlast me! Definitely would buy another if we needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie H. M. Pili

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It is even better than I expected. It has a 60 minute auto off timer you can set, multiple shades of light and you can adjust the brightness too. The flex neck allows much flexibility with how you point the light, including to the ceiling if you wish. It took me about 3 minutes to assemble out of the box - each section piece screws onto each other. I highly recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Shop USA

product_meta.title: TaoTronics LED Floor Lamp 1815 Lux & 50,000 Hours Lifespan, Dimmable Standing Floor Lamp Flexible Gooseneck Touch Control Panel for Living Room, UL Adapter
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackTaoTronics - Smart Made Simple Fully Customizable Illumination 
Based on the surrounding environment, the time of the day, or the activity, one type of light might be more suitable than others. 
The TaoTronics LED Floor Lamp enables you to choose between 5colortemperatures and 5 brightness levels to mix and match for the most ideal lighting at all times. 

LED for 50, 000 Hour Lifespan: 
Switching to LED is simply a must nowadays. 
In addition to coming with a 50, 000-hour lifespan that will save you the money and hassle to periodically purchase a new light bulb, the LED panel provides a bright beam up to 1815 lumens while consuming only 12W of power 

Easy to Operate: 
Absent of all unreliable mechanical button, the lamp is fully controlled via the built-in touch panel. 
This enables you to increase/decrease the brightness, choose the light color and even set a 1Htimer by long pressing the ON / OFF button. 

Secure, User-Friendly Build: 
Keeping the users in mind, TaoTronics has included a UL adapter that converts the voltage output to 12V/1. 5A to prevent electrical hazards. 
Both when the lamp is being used as a floor torchiere or dissembled to perform as a desk lamp, the stable base will sit steadily and keep it from toppling over. 

Dimmable LED Floor Lamp Specifications: 
Light Source: LED 
Operate Voltage: DC 12V / 1. 5A 
Power: 12W 
Color Temperature: 3000K - 6500K 
CRI: >80 

What’s in the Box: 
1 x TaoTronics Floor Lamp (Model: TT-DL060) 
1 x Power Adapter (power cord is 2 meters long) 
1 x User Guide
feature_bullets: Fully Customizable Illumination: Mix and match 5 color temperatures and 5 brightness levels for the most suitable light depending on the environment, activity, etc.
LED for 50,000 Hour Lifespan: Ecofriendly, long-lasting LED shines up to 1815 lumens while consuming only 12W of power
Easy to Operate: Built-in touch control provides a convenient, reliable way to set the light color, brightness
Secure, User-Friendly Build: Included UL adapter converts the voltage output to 12V/1.5A to prevent electrical hazards; the lamp's stable base will sit steadily without toppling over

specifications.Special Features: Touch Dimmer, Modern Design, Memory Function, No Glare Reflects on Screen, Flexible Gooseneck, Dimmable, 1800 lm with 12W lighting output, Philips EnabLED Licensing Program
specifications.Included Components: User Guide, Power Adapter, TaoTronics Floor Lamp
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,230 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
